amendment.description: Amendment sought to allocate an additional $108,515,000 in funding for directed energy and other research and development at the Missile Defense Agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (AL) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 243 (Roll no. 308).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rogers (AL) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 243 (Roll no. 308).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Rogers (AL).
